description: This file is a PHP source file responsible for rendering and handling a web interface form for adding port forwarding rules, including IPv4 and IPv6 configurations, validation, and device selection.

methods.name: populateIPv6Addr
methods.description: Parses and expands IPv6 address with shorthand (::) notation into full eight-segment array.

methods.name: IsBlank
methods.description: Checks if form fields with specified prefix are blank, excluding specific fields.

methods.name: GetAddress
methods.description: Concatenates form input values with a separator to construct IPv6 address string.

methods.name: isIp6AddrRequired
methods.description: Determines if IPv6 address input is required based on form state.

methods.name: isIp4AddrRequired
methods.description: Determines if IPv4 address input is required based on form state.
